author: Special Correspondent
text:
The day long Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) conference on Emerging Devices and Smart Systems (ICEDSS) – 2016was held at the Mahendra Engineering College at Mallasamudram near here recently.

The event brought together both academics and industrial experts in the field of emerging devices and smart system to a common forum.

The national conference sponsored by IEEE was brought up by the Department of EEE, ECE and CSE of the Mahendra Engineering College. L. M. Patnaik, Honorary Professor, Indian Institute of Science, Bengaluru, in his inaugural address, said that the role of Internet of Things (IoT) has helped the entire society a lot.

M. G. Bharathkumar Chairman, Mahendra Educational Institutions, presided over.
title: Conference held
